snippet: India leads the world in total traffic fatalities, and children on their way to and from school make up a surprising number of them.
abstract: New Delhi journal; horrific school bus accidents occur with alarming regularity in India, which leads the world in total traffic fatalities; experts attribute accidents to a deadly combination of bad roads, chaotic traffic, poorly enforced safeguards, badly trained bus drivers and a lack of political will to address the problem.
lead_paragraph: India leads the world in total traffic fatalities, and children on their way to and from school make up a surprising number of them.

headline.main: The Road to the Schoolhouse Proves Perilous for India’s Young
